metadata.title: CVE-2018-9165 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The pushdup function in util/decompile.c in libming through 0.4.8 does notrecognize the need for ActionPushDuplicate to perform a deep copy when aString is at the top of the stack, making the library vulnerable to autil/decompile.c getName NULL pointer dereference, which may allowattackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted SWF file.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
